name: Smoked Turkey And Avocado Sandwiches With Tangy Corn Relish
keywords: avocado, cilantro, corn kernels, jalapeño, lime juice, multigrain bread, rice wine vinegar, smoked turkey breast, watercress, high fiber, main course, summer
recipeIngredient: 1/2 pound thinly sliced smoked turkey breast

recipeInstructions.text: Halve and pit avocado; scoop flesh into a small bowl. Mash with a fork.

Spread one side of each bread slice with mashed avocado. Season to taste with salt. Ruffle sliced turkey over two bread slices. Divide corn relish over turkey. Top with watercress; cover with remaining bread, avocado side down. Cut sandwiches in half diagonally, and serve at once.
